text: Tom Tucker (3 October 1912 – 21 December 1982) was a former Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Tom Tucker's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1912 births Category:1982 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Tom Tucker (footballer)
